title: Words at the Threshold - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/7/19
itunes:title: Words at the Threshold - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/7/19
description:
George Noory and linguist Lisa Smartt explore her research into the final words people speak before they pass over, whether there are messages for relatives who are still alive or even clues into whether there is life after death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
